import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./App.css"; function App() { const [sceneBlocks, setSceneBlocks] = useState([]); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState("one-shot"); const maxScenes = activeTab === "campaign" ? 15 : 4; const allScenes = ["Combat", "Puzzle", "Social", "Exploration", "Investigation", "Chase", "Boss Fight"]; const addScene = (scene) => { if (sceneBlocks.length < maxScenes) { setSceneBlocks([...sceneBlocks, scene]); } }; return (
